items.title: Operations Manager
items.description: Humanitarian logistics support project focused on access, analysis and capacity building in a multi-risk environment.
bullets: Coordination and management of an emergency preparedness project
Operational planning, budget monitoring, performance analysis, and donor reporting
Definition and supervision of the implementation of strategic guidelines
Design, development, and drafting of new projects
Management of institutional partnerships and inter-NGO coordination

items.title: Country Logistics Manager
items.description:
Response to the full-scale invasion of 2022 
 Protection, inclusion, rehabilitation and armed violence reduction missions
bullets: Management of the logistics team in the capital and across 3 sites (62 people, including 8 direct reports)
Training and support for position nationalization
Logistics support for local partners
Supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, training)
Supervision and logistics support to projects
Definition of logistics strategies and activity planning
Supervision of national supply flows and customs clearance operations

items.title: Logistics Head of Department
items.description: Mustisectoral response to support populations and public services affected by the conflict resulting from the full-scale 2022 invasion
bullets: Supervision of the logistics team in the capital, and support to 4 (then 2) provincial bases
Team management and leadership (around 15 people)
Training and support for position nationalization
Logistics support for local partners
Supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, training)
Supervision and logistics support to projects
Definition of logistics strategies and activity planning
Supervision of national supply flows and customs clearance operations

items.title: Country Logistics Coordinator
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
bullets: Supervision of the logistics team in the capital, and support to two provincial bases
Team management and leadership (around 25 people), supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, training), and drafting of job descriptions
Supervision and logistics support to projects
Definition of logistics strategies and activity planning
Technical support to a mobile clinic project in an emergency response context
Supervision of the operational implementation of security procedures, and participation in crisis cells
Supervision of national supply flows and customs clearance operations
Supervision of health center rehabilitation and construction works
Representation and networking (RLH, ClusterLog, NGOs)

items.title: Area Logistics Manager
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
bullets: Supervising and leading a team of a dozen people
Supervising the supply, transport and storage of programme inputs in the province
Monitoring and managing the vehicle, communications and IT fleets
Opening a sub-base as part of an emergency response, and taking part in drawing up and launching a rapid response
Taking part in defining project construction and writing and monitoring budgets
Monitoring security, analysis and monitoring of the security of the base, travel and teams, participation in the drafting of protocols
Coordination of recruitment processes, evaluations and definition of HR needs
Supervision of the rehabilitation and construction of health centres
Training of teams (Excel, Word, stock management, purchasing procedures, etc.), and participation in the drafting of budgets. ..)

items.title: Project Logistics Manager
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
bullets: Gestion et suivi de stock
Gestion des EPI Covid19 (stock, commande, préparation, suivi)
Approvisionnement
Préparation distribution et intervention
Travail de mise à niveau du parc informatique
Création et mise à niveau protocoles (sorties, stock, achat)
Accompagnement à évaluation de la sécurité

items.title: Legal support for studies and diagnostics
items.description: Support for the regional directorate, in carrying out an exploratory mission on the situation of migrant people in southern Tunisia (Medenine and Tataouine governorates), and work on analysing the equal framework, for carrying out two initial diagnoses on the Tunisian territory
bullets: Study on sexual violence and the sexual and reproductive health needs of young people and women with disabilities
Study on the conditions of residence, reception and access to mainstream services for migrants

items.title: Programme coordination support officer
bullets: Participation in actions supporting partners' capacity strengthening
Support for project monitoring (logical frameworks, budgets, job descriptions, reports)
Redesign of a data collection tool (needs definition, specifications, interface, ethics, security, features)
Design of a communication plan and a new graphic charter, and support for digitizing selected processes
Writing and layout of awareness materials and news briefs
Facilitation of meetings and team-building activities

items.title: Legal support officer at the civic life centre
items.description: Accompaniment and support in setting up procedures to overhaul public reception areas. Legal studies of the feasibility of partnership projects and long leases

items.title: Chocolate shop assistant
items.description: Welcoming and advising customers, selling and cashing, stocking shelves and respecting product rotation, receiving and preparing orders, monitoring stock levels, producing products.

items.title: Deputy Transport Manager
items.description: Accompaniment and support in setting up procedures to overhaul public reception areas. Legal studies of the feasibility of partnership projects and long leases

items.title: Transport Operations Officer
items.description: Registering and entering departure flows, handling complaints, monitoring and optimising processes, dispatching rounds, inter-departmental coordination

items.title: Material handler
items.description: Receiving and accounting for goods, quality control and sorting of products, repackaging of goods.
